               Administration of county government generally, G.S. 153A-76 et seq.; general ordinance-making
               power, G.S. 153A-121; corporate powers, G.S. 153A-11; establishing and abolishing
               townships, G.S. 153A-19; Local Government Finance Act, G.S. 159-1 et seq.; board of

               personnel rules and regulations, G.S. 153A-94.
